name: code-guardian
description: Code Guardian - Lightweight code security scanner

scripts.dev:both: start cmd /k "cd backend && .\mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run" && timeout /t 5 > nul && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules build 2>nul & cd .. && cd backend && .\mvnw.cmd clean
